name: Voyage (itch) (NIRMAL KUMAR)
description:
A VERY SHORT GAME MADE FOR

ELAN & NVISION 2023, GAME JAM

CONTROLS:

MOVEMENT: WASD

JUMP: SPACE

DASH: LSHIFT

Pause: Escape

YOU ARE AN ASTRONAUT, ON YOUR JOURNEY, THE UNEXPECTED ASTEROID CRASH OCCURS. IS THIS THE END OF YOUR JOURNEY?

THIS GAME FEATURES 3 ENDINGS. 

END THE GAME ON YOUR OWN WAY.

 

CREDITS:

Player Character - BRACKEYS 2D MEGA PACK(https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/free-2d-mega-pack-177430)

TILESET AND DECORATIONS - Cainos(https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/environments/pixel-art-platformer-villa...)

ADDITIONAL ASSETS - KENNY PIXEL PLATFORMER(https://kenney.nl/assets/pixel-platformer)

MUSIC - JUHANI JUNKALA STAGE 2(https://opengameart.org/content/4-chiptunes-adventure)
